body:
For over three years, I worked on building websites for Terry Chiropractic that focused on obtaining and maintaining the top search result rankings on Google for the highest-converting keywords. When I first started the project, Terry Chiropractic's website was ranking on the second page and had a poor design. I conducted a comprehensive audit of all the competitors on the first page and sought inspiration from sites that were in more advanced markets like tech, law firms, etc. I synthesized the best ideas into a new design and then built, deployed, and migrated the site. Within a month, we started to see a trickle of new patients referred to us by the website for the first time despite little to no improvement in the rankings.
Obtaining the top search ranking required going beyond typical local SEO tactics at the time. After learning more about how the Google algorithm is constantly improving, I identified an opportunity in our market. I saw that most chiropractic offices were working with marketing agencies that were trying to game the algorithm by producing a high volume of keyword-packed content that offered little to no value. Because of this, I shifted my efforts toward producing content that our ideal customers actually found valuable and propagated it to all channels. Additionally, I implemented a strategy of gaining backlinks by exchanging value with other businesses in our area. We rapidly rose to the top rankings within a matter of months, and the trickle of new patients became a tsunami.

img.alt: Proof of top ranking in SEO
